response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds significant value to me, but I understand its worth to you is $8,000. Considering this, I propose a deal where you can acquire the product for $9,500. This price reflects my desire to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing the value I receive for my asset. I believe we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 9500}
